description: [QakBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0650) has the ability to capture web session cookies.(Citation: Kroll Qakbot June 2020)(Citation: Kaspersky QakBot September 2021)

external_references.description: Sette, N. et al. (2020, June 4). Qakbot Malware Now Exfiltrating Emails for Sophisticated Thread Hijacking Attacks. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
Kuzmenko, A. et al. (2021, September 2). QakBot technical analysis. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
